text: ‘Tis the season to stream holiday movies nonstop! Here’s everything you need to know about watching Hallmark Channel online so you can close out the month of December with holiday cheer. How to Watch Hallmark Channel Live Online How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online Without Cable Hallmark’s annual “Countdown to Christmas” programming event is winding down, but you still have a few chances left to gather ’round the tree and curl up for a festive flick. If you’re a cord-cutter hoping to watch Hallmark Channel online, you’ll need to sign up for Peacock — which has a Hallmark Channel livestream — or a live-TV streaming service that includes the channel. Below, we’re outlining all the ways to watch Hallmark Channel live online. How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: Peacock Courtesy of Peacock Peacock is home a Hallmark Channel livestream under its “channels” tab. With Peacock, you can also watch Hallmark movies from the streaming library, and tune in to all things NBC. Plans start at just $7.99/month, making Peacock the most affordable way to watch Hallmark titles online. How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: Hulu + Live TV Courtesy of Hulu The Hulu + Live TV subscription is the most comprehensive plan that allows you to watch Hallmark Channel online. For $82.99/month, you get tons of content with this bundle subscription — making this package great for addressing all your cord-cutter needs, not just for watching Hallmark. If you plan on subscribing to a live-TV streaming service to replace cable, this is the best option for you. If you’re just looking for quick, cheap way to watch Hallmark Channel the rest of this month, however, we recommend Peacock. How to Stream Hallmark Channel for Free The only way to watch Hallmark Channel for free online is by signing up for a live-TV streaming service and enjoying the short free trial period. Some of the aforementioned services offer free trials — including Fubo and DirecTV — so you can watch Hallmark Channel for free for a few days. What Is Hallmark Plus? Hallmark Plus is Hallmark’s streaming service, formerly known as Hallmark Movies Now. The streaming platform does not offer a Hallmark Channel livestream, so you can’t watch the TV lineup there. You can, however, access Hallmark library titles and some exclusive series and movies, including Finding Mr. Christmas and Holidazed. ‘Tis the season to stream holiday movies nonstop! Here’s everything you need to know about watching Hallmark Channel online so you can close out the month of December with holiday cheer.

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Live Online

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online Without Cable

Hallmark’s annual “Countdown to Christmas” programming event is winding down, but you still have a few chances left to gather ’round the tree and curl up for a festive flick. If you’re a cord-cutter hoping to watch Hallmark Channel online, you’ll need to sign up for Peacock — which has a Hallmark Channel livestream — or a live-TV streaming service that includes the channel. Below, we’re outlining all the ways to watch Hallmark Channel live online.

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: Peacock

Peacock is home a Hallmark Channel livestream under its “channels” tab. With Peacock, you can also watch Hallmark movies from the streaming library, and tune in to all things NBC. Plans start at just $7.99/month, making Peacock the most affordable way to watch Hallmark titles online.

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: DirecTV Stream

DirecTV Stream

On Sale 17% off

DirecTV Stream packages include Hallmark Channel, so you can choose between a few different subscriptions to find one that best fits your needs. The Choice package is the most popular option and is currently on sale at a $20 discount for your first three months. If you sign up now, you can pay $94.99/month instead of the usual $114.99/month for three whole months. Plus, there’s a five-day free trial so you can watch Hallmark Channel online for free if you cancel your subscription once the trial ends!

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: Fubo TV

Fubo is another great way to watch Hallmark Channel online for free thanks to its seven-day free trial. For a limited-time, you can get one month of Fubo for as low as $44.99/month, giving you access to Hallmark and more than 175 other channels. More good news? You can cancel and change your subscription at any time, making Fubo a low-commitment, easy option for watching Hallmark Channel without cable.

How to Watch Hallmark Channel Online: Hulu + Live TV

The Hulu + Live TV subscription is the most comprehensive plan that allows you to watch Hallmark Channel online. For $82.99/month, you get tons of content with this bundle subscription — making this package great for addressing all your cord-cutter needs, not just for watching Hallmark. If you plan on subscribing to a live-TV streaming service to replace cable, this is the best option for you. If you’re just looking for quick, cheap way to watch Hallmark Channel the rest of this month, however, we recommend Peacock.

How to Stream Hallmark Channel for Free

The only way to watch Hallmark Channel for free online is by signing up for a live-TV streaming service and enjoying the short free trial period. Some of the aforementioned services offer free trials — including Fubo and DirecTV — so you can watch Hallmark Channel for free for a few days.

What Is Hallmark Plus?

Hallmark Plus is Hallmark’s streaming service, formerly known as Hallmark Movies Now. The streaming platform does not offer a Hallmark Channel livestream, so you can’t watch the TV lineup there. You can, however, access Hallmark library titles and some exclusive series and movies, including Finding Mr. Christmas and Holidazed.
